description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.0M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with 2220742 ONTARIO. The average
  contract duration was 0.76 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $821.8K.
  The longest contract was 2.71 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $6.1M.
